tasks.label: Lifecycle configure & activate iiqka_moveit_welding
tasks.command: ros2 lifecycle set robot_manager configure && ros2 lifecycle set robot_manager activate

tasks.label: Launch iiqka_moveit_welding
tasks.command: echo 'Sourcing package...' && source install/setup.bash && echo 'Launching RViz...' && ros2 launch iiqka_moveit_welding moveit_welding_planning.launch.py

tasks.label: Run iiqka_moveit_welding
tasks.command: echo 'Sourcing package...' && source install/setup.bash && echo 'Running node...' && ros2 run iiqka_moveit_welding iiqka_moveit_welding
